response.answer_text: If any query is facing by the user, the customer support team will assist in resolving their issues and rectify them within a few minutes/hours. They never miscommunicate with the users/customers coming up with their queries and also support executive team never get irritated to revert to solving customer issues. The support team automates your ticket request process using helpdesk software to assist in a couple of minutes after raising the requests. It is not a manual task; someone may have to assign specific queries. It is automated software to assist customer queries with an effective response to satisfy the customer to use the product/service and to become a loyal customer to the organization.
